articles.title: Trump Pledges to Double Tariffs on Foreign Steel and Aluminum to 50%
articles.description: President Trump made the announcement at a U.S. Steel factory outside Pittsburgh.
articles.content:
President Trump said on Friday that he would double the tariffs he had levied on foreign steel and aluminum to 50 percent, a move that he claimed would further protect the industry.
The announcement came as Mr. Trump traveled to a U.S. Steel factory ... [841 chars]

articles.title: American, Delta and United charging much more for solo passengers on some routes
articles.description: On some routes operated by American, Delta, and United, solo travelers are being charged significantly more than groups of two or more.
articles.content: It’s fairly common to search for airline tickets and find that ticket prices are cheaper for one seat than they are for two (or more). Airlines normally have a certain number of seats sorted into multiple fare classes (or buckets) and, once one fare ... [4825 chars]

articles.title: Trump doubles steel tariffs to 50% in ‘major announcement’
articles.description: President Donald Trump announced Friday that he would set tariffs on steel imported into the United States at 50%, double their current rate.
articles.content:
CNN —
President Donald Trump announced Friday that he would set tariffs on steel imported into the United States at 50%, double their current rate.
At a US Steel facility in West Mifflin, Pennsylvania, Trump said he had a “major announcement.” To an ... [4371 chars]
